resources.string: For this app to work, you need to enable developer connection in the Pebble app!
Please note that unless you enable included Xposed module (needs root), developer connection will shut down itself after 10 minutes.
Error while connecting to Pebble\'s developer connection. Do you have it on?
Please open wanted target app on your watch and press continue.
Module that removes Pebble\'s developer connection timeout
